mapper.select: SELECT CM.COMMUTE_WD, CM.COMMUTE_LD, CM.EMPLOYEE_CD, EM.EMPLOYEE_NM, CC.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_DP, CC2.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_GD, CM.COMMUTE_WT, CM.COMMUTE_LT, CM.WORKINGHOUR_ID, CM.COMMUTE_PR, (SELECT CC.COMMON_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.COMMON_GC = 'ATDC' AND CC.COMMON_CC = CASE WHEN CM.COMMUTE_WT > WH.WORKINGHOUR_WT THEN 'LATE' ELSE 'NORMAL' END) AS COMMUTE_ST FROM COMMUTE CM LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE EM ON EM.EMPLOYEE_CD = CM.EMPLOYEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' AND CC.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_DP LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = 'POSITION' AND CC2.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_GD LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKINGHOUR WH ON WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID = EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM.EMPLOYEE_CD = #{employee_cd} AND CM.EMPLOYEE_CD LIKE '%${filter.employee_cd}%' AND EM.EMPLOYEE_NM LIKE '%${filter.employee_nm}%' AND CC.COMMON_NM LIKE '%${filter.employee_dp}%' AND CC2.COMMON_NM LIKE '%${filter.employee_gd}%' AND CM.COMMUTE_WT >= #{filter.commute_wt} AND CM.COMMUTE_LT <= #{filter.commute_lt} AND CM.COMMUTE_WD >= TO_DATE(#{filter.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CM.COMMUTE_LD <= TO_DATE(#{filter.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY CM.COMMUTE_WD DESC

SELECT CM.COMMUTE_WD, CM.COMMUTE_LD, CM.EMPLOYEE_CD, EM.EMPLOYEE_NM, CC.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_DP, CC2.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_GD, CM.COMMUTE_WT, CM.COMMUTE_LT, CM.WORKINGHOUR_ID, CM.COMMUTE_PR, (SELECT CC.COMMON_NM FROM COMMON_CODE CC WHERE CC.COMMON_GC = 'ATDC' AND CC.COMMON_CC = CASE WHEN CM.COMMUTE_WT > WH.WORKINGHOUR_WT THEN 'LATE' ELSE 'NORMAL' END) AS COMMUTE_ST FROM COMMUTE CM LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE EM ON EM.EMPLOYEE_CD = CM.EMPLOYEE_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' AND CC.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_DP LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = 'POSITION' AND CC2.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_GD LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKINGHOUR WH ON WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID = EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CM.EMPLOYEE_CD = #{employee_cd} AND CM.COMMUTE_WD = #{commute_wd} ORDER BY CM.COMMUTE_WD

SELECT EM.EMPLOYEE_CD, EM.EMPLOYEE_NM, CC.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_DP, CC2.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_GD, EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID FROM EMPLOYEE EM LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMUTE CM ON CM.EMPLOYEE_CD = EM.EMPLOYEE_CD AND CM.COMMUTE_WD = #{commute_wd} LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' AND CC.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_DP LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = 'POSITION' AND CC2.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_GD WHERE CM.EMPLOYEE_CD IS NULL AND EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT
COMMUTE_WD, COMMUTE_WT, COMMUTE_LT
CM.COMMUTE_WD,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE EM WHERE EM.EMPLOYEE_US = 1 ) AS total_emp, SUM(CASE WHEN CM.COMMUTE_WT > WH.WORKINGHOUR_WT THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS late, SUM(CASE WHEN CM.COMMUTE_LT IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS working, COUNT(CM.COMMUTE_LT) AS leave, count(*) total
FROM COMMUTE CM LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKINGHOUR WH ON WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID = CM.WORKINGHOUR_ID WHERE COMMUTE_WD BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND EMPLOYEE_CD = #{employee_cd} GROUP BY CM.COMMUTE_WD

SELECT WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID, WH.WORKINGHOUR_NM, WH.WORKINGHOUR_US, WH.WORKINGHOUR_RM, '( ' ||COUNT(EM.EMPLOYEE_CD) || ' / ' || (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLOYEE_US = 1) || ' )' EMPLOYEE_CNT FROM WORKINGHOUR WH LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE EM ON WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID = EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID AND EM.EMPLOYEE_US = 1 GROUP BY WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID, WH.WORKINGHOUR_NM, WH.WORKINGHOUR_US, WH.WORKINGHOUR_RM

SELECT EM.EMPLOYEE_CD, EM.EMPLOYEE_NM, CC.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_DP, CC2.COMMON_NM EMPLOYEE_GD, EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID FROM EMPLOYEE EM LEFT OUTER JOIN WORKINGHOUR WH ON WH.WORKINGHOUR_ID = EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.COMMON_GC = 'DEPARTMENT' AND CC.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_DP LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC2 ON CC2.COMMON_GC = 'POSITION' AND CC2.COMMON_CC = EM.EMPLOYEE_GD WHERE EM.EMPLOYEE_US = 1 AND
EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID IS NULL
EM.WORKINGHOUR_ID = #{workinghour_id}
ORDER BY EM.EMPLOYEE_NM
